name: Shoot (itch) (Iliketomakegames111)
description: This is a very basic game i spent a few days making, just to say i am working on a bigger project rn so i spent more time on that, there may be some bugs and all but i did not spend a lot of time on this game. And plus i am working on a mobile game, it will be out in a few mounths, the name is Tacky pls download it when its out, and dont be mad it it says pls gimmie 1 dollar, that was just something but this game is kinda bad but i hope you like it :))
